name: Odolwa's Remains
description: The remains of the boss in Woodfall Temple

name: Goth's Remains
description: The remains of the boss in Snowhead Temple

name: Gyorg's Remains
description: The remains of the boss in Great Bay Temple

name: Twinmold's Remains
description: The remains of the boss in Stone Tower Temple

name: Quiver
description: A quiver that can hold 30 arrows.

name: Large Quiver
description: A quiver that can hold 40 arrows.

name: Largest Quiver
description: A quiver that can hold 50 arrows.

name: Bomb Bag
description: A bomb bag that can hold 20 bombs.

name: Big Bomg Bag
description: A bomb bag that can hold 30 bombs.

name: Biggest Bomb Bag
description: A bomb bag that can hold 40 bombs.

name: Wallet
description: A wallet that can hold 99 rupees.

name: Adult Wallet
description: A wallet that can hold 200 rupees.

name: Giant Wallet
description: A wallet that can hold 500 rupees.

name: Fire Arrow
description: Set to it to [C] to arm your bow with arrows that burst into flame.

name: Ice Arrow
description: Set to it to [C] to arm your bow with arrows that freeze.

name: Light Arrow
description: Set to it to [C] to arm your bow. Aim its sacred light at evil.

name: Postman's Hat
description: You can look in mailboxes when you wear this with [C].

name: All-Night Mask
description: When you wear it with [C] you don't get sleepy.

name: Blast Mask
description: Weat it with [C], then detonate it with [B]. Losing hearts from the explosion is a side effect.

name: Stone Mask
description: Become as plain as stone so you can blend into your surroundings.

name: Great Fairy's Mask
description: The mask's hair will shimmer when you're close to a Stray Fairy.

name: Keaton Mask
description: The mask of the ghost fox Keaton. Wear it with [C].

name: Bremen Mask
description: Wear it with [C] so young animals will mistake you from their leader.

name: Bunny Hood
description: Wear it with [C] to be filled with the speed and hearing of the wild.

name: Don Gero's Mask
description: When you wear it, you call the Frog Choir members together.

name: Mask of Scents
description: Wear it with [C] to heighten your sense of smell.

name: Romani's Mask
description: Wear it with [C] to show you're a member of the Milk Bar, Latte.

name: Circus Leader's Mask
description: People related to Gorman will react to this.

name: Kafei's Mask
description: Wear it with [C] to inquire about Kafei's whereabouts.

name: Couple's Mask
description: When you wear it with [C], you can soften people's hearts.

name: Mask of Truth
description: Wear it to read the thoughts of Gossip Stones and animals.

name: Kamaro's Mask
description: Wear this with [C] to perfom a mysterious dance.

name: Gibdo Mask
description: Use it with [C]. Even a real Gibdo will mistake you from its own kind.

name: Garo's Mask
description: This mask can summon the hidden Garo ninjas. Wear it with [C].

name: Captain's Hat
description: Wear it [C] to pose as Captain Keeta.

name: Giant's Mask
description: If you wear it in a certain room, you'll grow into a giant.

name: Deku Mask
description: Wear it with [C] to assume Deku form. Use [C] to change back.

name: Goron Mask
description: Wear it with [C] to assume Goron form. Use [C] to change back.

name: Zora Mask
description: Wear it with [C] to assume Zora form. Use [C] to change back.

name: Fierce Deity's Mask
description: Wear it with [C]. Its dark power can be used only in boss rooms.

name: Ocarina of Time
description: This musical instrument is filled with memories of Princess Zelda. Play it with  [A] and the four [C] Buttons. Press [B] to stop.

name: Hero's Bow
description: Press [C] to shoot an arrow. Use [Stick] to aim.

name: Bomb
description: Light and place it with [C]. Press [C] while running to throw it!

name: Bombchu
description: Arm and launch this wall-crawling bomb with [C].

name: Deku Stick
description: Use [C] to swing it. Stand still and press [A] to put it away.

name: Deku Nut
description: Press [C] to throw it. Upon impact, its flash blinds enemies, stopping them in their tracks.

name: Magic Beans
description: Use [C] to plant them. Plant them in soft soil.

name: Powder Keg
description: Carry and place it with [C]. Both its power and size are immense!

name: Pictograph Box
description: Use it with [C] and snap pictographs with [A]. You can keep only one shot at a time.

name: Lens of Truth
description: Use [C] and magic to see what the naked eye cannot.

name: Hookshot
description: Aim with [Stick]. Press [C] to fire the hook and grapple objects.

name: Great Fairy's Sword
description: The most powerful sword has black roses etched in its blade. Brandish it with [C].

name: Empty Bottle
description: Carry various items in this. Contain or release them with [C].
